metadata.title: CVE-2024-3661 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: DHCP can add routes to a clientâ€™s routing table via the classless staticroute option (121). VPN-based security solutions that rely on routes toredirect traffic can be forced to leak traffic over the physical interface.An attacker on the same local network can read, disrupt, or possibly modifynetwork traffic that was expected to be protected by the VPN.

criterions.comment: openvpn package in trusty is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
pptpd package in trusty is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
